data.Name: Kristen Keyes
data.staff_bio: Kristen has assisted a diverse population of adolescents and adults with physical, cognitive, social and/or emotional disabilities in finding and maintaining employment since 2004.  Before coming to ICI, she worked as the Program Coordinator for the Employment Service at Community Connections in South Yarmouth, MA.  In her current position, Kristen provides direct skills training to individuals in the Work Experience Program at Childrenâ€™s Hospital, as well as individuals who work in their communities.  Kristen works closely with hiring managers, recruiters, and other human resource professionals to develop and secure long-term employment for individuals with disabilities.
